mapper.select:
select
from c_personal_account ac inner join c_personal_card ca on ac.user_id =ca.user_id where 1=1
AND ca.name like concat('%', #{dto.name}, '%') or ca.phone like concat('%', #{dto.name}, '%')
AND ac.product_type =#{dto.productType}
AND DATE_FORMAT(ac.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{dto.params.beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(ac.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{dto.params.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
